This command will install an pkgdiff program in the This command will install an pkgdiff program in the
PREFIX/bin system directory and private modules into the PREFIX/share: PREFIX/bin system directory and private modules into the PREFIX/share:
sudo perl Makefile.pl -install --prefix=PREFIX [/usr, /usr/local, ...] sudo perl Makefile.pl -install --prefix=PREFIX [/usr, /usr/local, ...]
